info.name: Purple Youtube
info.description: YouTube theme variant on my YouTube - Dark Shiny Blue, transparency theme, except modified to use a new purple background image and I replaced all the blue colors with purple ones. 5/31/10 - Replaced background image (exceeded bandwidth limit) 5/14/10 - Updated code base from YouTube - Dark Shiny Blue, transparency 3/5/10 - Updated code base from YouTube - Dark Shiny Blue, transparency 12/23/09 - Finally updated this theme. Based on updated code from YouTube - Dark Shiny Blue, transparency
